tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE UserInteractions (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    ar_object_id INT,
    preference_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    user_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_time TIME,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_details JSONB,
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_learning_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    learning_session_id INT NOT NULL,
    learning_topic VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    learning_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ARActivities ( 
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    activity_name VARCHAR(100), 
    activity_description TEXT, 
    created_by UUID, 
    created_at TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE UserActivityLog ( 
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    user_id UUID, 
    activity_id UUID, 
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    log_details JSONB 
);
